name: Tutorial Code Blocks
tagline: Code blocks related for our YouTube tutorial sessions
body:
### Welcome to the Code Blocks!
Here you will find the various code blocks and examples related to our online training sessions you can find [here, on our YouTube channel](http://www.youtube.com/user/GeonTechnologies/).  Either use one of the download links or clone as you would normally:

```
$ git clone git://github.com/GeonTech/Code_Blocks/
```

Please feel free to watch this repository or subscribe to our channel for updates.  We also have additional [training materials](http://geontech.com/redhawk/training/) available on [our website](http://geontech.com/) as well as offer instructor-led classroom-based training.

We look forward to [hearing](mail://redhawk@geontech.com) from you!

### Organization of Materials
This repository contains two major groups of files.  Utilities contains general scripts that could be helpful for administering a REDHAWK SDR system or our tutorials.  The Tutorials section's subfolders each match with the corresponding YouTube video.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
